/application/logs/*
/application/cache/*
!application/logs/index.html
!application/cache/index.html

# Environment
.env
*.env

Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
desktop.ini

# IDE / Editor
.vscode/
.idea/
*.sublime-workspace
*.sublime-project

vendor/
composer.lock

node_modules/
npm-debug.log*
